title: Tolix A Chair  Black
body: One of our most popular selling chairs. The Tolix A Chair known also as Marais A Chair, is designed in 1934 by the metalworker and functionalist Xavier Pauchard. They become increasingly popular as a part of domestic interior design and soon the different models found their place in factories, offices and hospitals, as well as outside, on café terraces and in public parks. This all-weather use chair is great for indoor and outdoor settings. For longevity, care should be taken to protect from long periods of wet weather.
